2_1CMYxdit4qq9QGk9DYRu2ruRPd2YDGckH8.body:
> [glock](#comment_44_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa): You might want to adjust some colors in the file "all.css" to make the text in the sidebar more readable.Some suggestions... 
> 
> To turn the grey background of the latest comments box into dark grey:Search for:.lastcomments { background-color: #AAAAAAReplace with:.lastcomments { background-color: #111111 
> 
> To turn the black text in the sidebar into light grey:Search for:a { border-bottom: 1px solid #3498db; text-decoration: none; color: blackReplace with:a { border-bottom: 1px solid #3498db; text-decoration: none; color: #BBB 
> 
> To turn the grey background of the comments form into dark grey:Search for:.comment { background-color: #444444Replace with:.comment { background-color: #111111

thank you!
I am slowly learning all kinds of things about html/css/etc. But it takes a while.
I think if you check now, it should look better.
